full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO DRIN CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS GSUNGS PA SA BDAG CHAB GTOR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES SA BDAG CHAB GTOR 'DI NYID SNGON GYI MKHAS PA'I YIG RNYING GI STENG DU, GANG DGOS PA KHA BSGYUR BYAS PA LAS DANG BSTUN PA 'BYUNG NGO ZHES 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA DGE SLONG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, BKRA SHIS,)
